title: Summer Solstice: 35% Off Premium Flower
description: Celebrate the summer season with 35% off all premium flower strains including exclusive Purple Punch, Gelato, and White Widow. Newsletter exclusive deal!
previewDescription: Celebrate the summer season with special pricing on premium flower strains. Newsletter subscribers get exclusive access to this deal.
terms: Newsletter subscribers only. Valid for premium flower only. Cannot be combined with other offers.

title: Midsummer Munchies: BOGO Gummies
description: Buy any gummy product and get a second one absolutely free! Perfect for stocking up on your favorite summer treats from top brands.
terms: Equal or lesser value free. Valid on gummy products only. Loyalty members get priority.

title: Concentrate Connoisseur Flash Sale
description: 6-hour flash sale on premium live resin, rosin, and diamond concentrates. Save big on the highest quality extracts available.
terms: Flash sale pricing. While supplies last. Premium concentrates only.

title: Weekend Warrior Special
description: All weekend long - 25% off your entire purchase. Stock up on flower, edibles, vapes, and accessories for summer adventures.
terms: Valid Friday through Sunday. All product categories included. No minimum purchase.

title: New Customer Summer Welcome
description: First-time visitors get 30% off their entire first purchase plus a free gift! Explore our full range of premium cannabis products.
terms: New customers only. Valid ID required. One-time use. Free gift with $50+ purchase.

title: Vape Pod Variety Pack Deal
description: Buy 3 vape pods and get the 4th absolutely free! Mix and match flavors from our extensive selection of premium brands.
terms: Buy 3 get 1 free. Lowest priced item free. Vape pods only.

title: Medical Monday Extended
description: Medical patients receive 20% off all products every Monday in July. Valid medical card holders get additional loyalty points.
terms: Valid medical marijuana card required. Monday only. Stackable with loyalty rewards.

title: Summer Solstice Edibles Extravaganza
description: 50% off select chocolate bars and hard candies. Premium edibles from top manufacturers at unbeatable summer prices.
terms: Select products only. While supplies last. Limit 5 items per customer.

title: Zenleaf Summer Loyalty Bonus
description: Loyalty members get $25 off orders over $150. Plus earn double points on all purchases this weekend!
terms: Loyalty members only. Minimum $150 purchase. Double points weekend special.

title: Terra's Accessories Summer Sale
description: 40% off all smoking accessories including pipes, papers, grinders, and storage solutions. Everything you need for summer sessions.
terms: Accessories only. All brands included. Cannot combine with other discounts.

title: Apothecarium Premium Thursday
description: Every Thursday in July - top-shelf strains at mid-tier prices. Experience premium quality without the premium price tag.
terms: Thursdays only. Premium flower strains. Limited quantities available.

title: Acreage Summer Sampler Pack
description: Try our top 3 concentrate strains in a special sampler pack. Perfect for discovering your new favorite at a great price!
terms: Sampler pack only. Three 0.5g concentrates. Mix and match available.

title: Nirvana Newsletter Exclusive: Midnight Madness
description: Newsletter subscribers only! Midnight to 6 AM special - 40% off everything in store. Limited time flash promotion.
previewDescription: Special midnight event with store-wide savings. Newsletter subscribers get exclusive access to this flash promotion.
terms: Newsletter subscribers only. Valid midnight to 6 AM. All products included.

title: NAR Loyalty: Refer a Friend Bonus
description: Loyalty program special: Refer a friend and both get $20 off your next purchase plus bonus loyalty points!
terms: Loyalty members only. Both referrer and referee get discount. Minimum $60 purchase.

title: Enlighten Daily Newsletter: Power Hour
previewTitle: Daily Power Hour: Limited Time Savings
description: Daily newsletter subscribers get 1 hour of 30% off everything! Check your email for today's power hour time.
previewDescription: Daily limited-time savings event for newsletter subscribers. Check your email for exclusive timing and details.
terms: Newsletter subscribers only. 1-hour window daily. Time varies - check email.
